City of Lake Oswego

# Mayor and Council

 

![Mayor Joe Buck 2023](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/JBuck.jpg?itok=aA_rkxfq&c=f7f8d0ff5be0ae14c378f6081a494ec9)

Mayor Joe Buck

Joe Buck grew up in the Lake Grove neighborhood and is actively engaged with community organizations. Professionally, Mayor Buck owns several local restaurants. He is a U.S. Coast Guard veteran and graduated from the University of Portland.

[Read More about Mayor Joe Buck](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/citycouncil/mayor-joe-buck)

![Councilor Ali Afghan 2023](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/AAfghan1_0.jpg?itok=Xs5zuj51&c=f764a8a8f301557bd8f2463698828990)

Councilor Ali Afghan

Ali Afghan has lived in Lake Oswego since 1990. He is a Registered Professional Engineer and has over 30 years of experience in facilities design and engineering, construction project management, and organizational leadership. 

[Read More about Councilor Ali Afghan](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/citycouncil/councilor-ali-afghan)

![Councilor Trudy Corrigan 2023](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/TCorrigan2_0.jpg?itok=a455dOo8&c=4e9df75004d3ad61583bde78ca79c79f)

Councilor Trudy Corrigan

Trudy Corrigan is a community volunteer who has lived in Lake Oswego since 1991. Her professional background is in employee benefits consulting. While raising two children with her husband Kit, she actively volunteered in Lake Oswego schools and in the community.

[Read More about Councilor Trudy Corrigan](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/citycouncil/councilor-trudy-corrigan)

![Councilor Massene Mboup 2023](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/MMboup2.jpg?itok=6F_klekd&c=b3bea9243ee143772dabd3587e78a31d)

Councilor Massene Mboup

Massene Mboup is an educational scholar and community volunteer. He is an immigrant from Senegal, West Africa. Massene and his wife Patricia moved to Lake Oswego in 2011 to create a French Immersion School.

[Read More about Councilor Massene Mboup](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/citycouncil/councilor-massene-mboup)

![Councilor Aaron Rapf 2023](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/ARapfBlk.jpg?itok=eZDwRgyA&c=e20958f0a249189df83cbf4a7f9d8f0f)

Councilor Aaron Rapf

Aaron Rapf was born and raised in Oregon; growing up in Lake Oswego and Raleigh Hills. Aaron is a marketing consultant who has served many large global consumer-goods companies where he has extensive experience with brand marketing, strategic planning, and budgeting.

[Read More about Councilor Aaron Rapf](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/citycouncil/councilor-aaron-rapf)

![Councilor Rachel Verdick 2023](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/RVerdick1.jpg?itok=zLptXcrX&c=f079c19312c290b76fcad15adb58aab5)

Councilor Rachel Verdick

Rachel Verdick is a Building Designer, local business owner, and community volunteer. She is a native Oregonian, growing up in southwest Portland who moved to Lake Oswego with her husband Jonathan Puskas in 2000.

[Read More about Councilor Rachel Verdick](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/citycouncil/councilor-rachel-verdick)

![Councilor John Wendland 2023](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/JWendland2.jpg?itok=FyPDFYuB&c=d08b2532659788ae846a8aa10cd8c26e)

Councilor John Wendland

John Wendland graduated from Lake Oswego High School. He earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Commerce and Accounting and a Certificate of Retail Studies from the Retail Management Institute at Santa Clara University.  

[Read More about Councilor John Wendland](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/citycouncil/councilor-john-wendland)

![](https://www.ci.oswego.or.us/sites/default/files/styles/primary/public/imageattachments/LOCouncil2023_2_blk.jpg?itok=PXaNPnn9&c=1da71f6d739fd06fdd7321a81376b45c)
